portfolio.title: Space tourism multi-page website
portfolio.discription: This project is a fun collaboration with Scrimba and Kevin Powell! If you like, you can follow along and watch Kevin complete the project on Scrimba. Lots to learn!

portfolio.title: Manage landing page
portfolio.discription: This challenge will be a great test for your responsive skills. There are lots of small details and slight content shifts for different screen sizes.

portfolio.title: Room homepage
portfolio.discription: This small homepage challenge packs a big punch to test your layout skills. There's also a slider in there to add a JS layer for extra practice.
